reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The scope of the project is a documentary series that aims to show a new generation of young people engaged through innovation to solve basic human rights of communities and who want to generate a positive impact on society through innovation and entrepren eurship. Nine documentaries of aprox. 5 minutes each related to the following topics will be made: Health education work family economy housing and basic services internet connection. The audiovisual pieces are available on the Web for broadcast and journa lists interested in covering projects may request the material. Dissemination: - Website Docs4Change. (http://docs4change.org/)- YouTube with a strategic plan made by Google. - Canal13 has committed a section in their website where www.13.cl for nine wee ks where each of the stories will be broadcasted.
